settings.username: Username prefix of the bots that build the cactus farm
settings.version: The version of Minecraft that the bot plays on
settings.numberOfBots: Number of bots that build the cactus farm. Supported numbers are 1-9
settings.foundationBlock: Block used for the foundation of the sand
settings.cactusBreakBlock: Block used to break the cactus
settings.tool: Tool the bots uses to break the foundation blocks, leave as empty if no tool are to be used
